review: I use it all of the time!  It is so nice for my older "dumb" TV that I had.  Super easy for anyone to just pick up and use and I have not had any issues with streaming.  I also really liked the app that you can download to your phone.  It is pretty cool to just say what you are looking for and letting the fire stick do the leg work.  It also helps find movies you may not have thought about.  Like if you like a particular actor for example, just say his name and all available movies with him in it will appear.  I also like that if for any reason I want to switch TVs it is simply unplugged from one and plugged into the other and takes up no room!  I might even buy a 2nd one to replace and old DVD player I was using for streaming.
author: Wags
